tool_description:
Get football live scores for today be it any match 
The scores are divided based on the league and you can fetch the data for all the leagues 

This also gives you flexibility to know and find the matches and scores between teams for any other given date as well
name: Football Score API
title: Football Score API

api_list.name: get_scores_for_given_date
api_list.description:
If you want to know the list of football matches for a given date and what was their scores you can use this API.
All this api needs is the date input in the format %Y-%m-%d.
Eg:- 2022-12-01
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football-score-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/scores/2022-12-04"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-score-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://football-score-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/scores/{date}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-score-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get_football_live_scores_today
api_list.description: Get Live scores for today's football matches
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football-score-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/live/scores/today"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-score-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
